title: Parliamentary select committee endorses AG-PP separation bill
desc: Chairman William Leong, however, says the accountability aspect of the bill should be further refined.

title: Bolivia's Chikungunya East/Central/South African Genotype Outbreak Highlights Vaccination Options
desc: Bolivia is currently experiencing a significant rise in chikungunya cases, mainly driven by intense transmission in the Santa Cruz department. This increase is part of a broader resurgence of the mosquito-borne virus across various regions of the Americas, as noted in an epidemiological alert issued by the Pan American Health Organization (PAHO) on February 26, 2026. The outbreak in Bolivia has been linked to the identification of the East/Central/South African genotype of the virus.

title: After 70-hr work call, Narayana Murthy has an AI warning for youngsters in India
desc: Amid rising fears that AI could disrupt white-collar jobs in India, Infosys founder Narayana Murthy has urged youngsters not to panic. Here is everything he said about this in a recent interview.

title: Roy Keane still expecting Tottenham to overcome West Ham United in relegation battle

title: Neonatal mortality trends over five years in Kenya: 2020-2024
desc: In 2020, the country recorded 10,800 neonatal deaths, a figure that climbed to 11,070 in 2021.

title: Why climate change demands a global response
desc: OSLO, NORWAY: The world is currently facing the challenge of environmental degradation and climate change that has not been witnessed in the past several decades. title: 'Get Paid to Throw' - Unofficial Marvel Rivals Bounty Website Faces Backlash as Players Ask NetEase to Intervene
desc: Marvel Rivals players are asking NetEase to take action after the emergence of an unofficial bounty website triggered fears that it could harm the community it’s supposedly trying to protect.
